ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of KPMG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, as auditor of Canada Eldor Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2010; and appointment of the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as joint auditor of Canada Eldor Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2010.
